A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If you want a recycled plot\, deus ex machina\, cliche\, and questionable acting (luking at you Mark ;)\, then this movie has it all. From a 25th hour retcon of a classic character\, to a pointless ideological message (of some sort) crammed down your throat in a segment of the movie that might make you fall asleep.\n\nWow. Just Wow. And I thought the Force Awakens was terrible\, way to go disney\, you have made a movie worse than AoTC.
